text:
Release date
February 2024
Question asked
Does disclosure E1-37 (b) refer to all forms of energy generated from nuclear sources, such as
electricity? Does ESRS E1 paragraph 37 (b) also encompass electricity mixes that include fractions
of nuclear-generated electricity?
ESRS reference
ESRS E1 Disclosure Requirement E1-5, ESRS E1 paragraphs AR 34 - 35
Key terms
Energy consumption; nuclear sources
Background
ESRS E1 paragraphs 35 to 37 state:
